page.title: 03A SUNDAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On Sunday mornings I get up at 10a.m. and make my bed.Then I go through to the bathroom and wash my face and clean my teeth.I get dressed then go down the stairs for breakfast.I have a fried-egg roll and a cup of tea.After that I take my dog out for a walk.When I come back,I go with my Mum to the Motel where she works.When I am there I help by writing the menu and collecting glasses.When we go home at 3p.m.I feed my kitten a boiled fish,then I make myself a salad roll and sit out on the garden bench.Afterwards,I set the table and help make the Sunday dinner.We usually have chicken,boiled potatoes,roast potatoes and cauliflower,and for pudding we have apple pie.Then I dry the dishes and watch T.V. I have a bath,wash my hair and at 9p.m. I go to bed.
